addonName.message: A nene'i i te mau api parau

addonDesc.message: A nene'i i te tapa'o tab urls ei mau tapa'o e aore râ, ei parau papa'i maramarama

cpyalllnk.message: Te mau tapao atoa ei mau taairaa

cpyalltxt.message: Te mau tapa'o atoa ei mau parau papa'i

cpysellnk.message: Te mau tapa'o i ma'itihia ei hono

cpyseltxt.message: Ma'itihia ei mau tapa'o faahoro parau

cpytablnk.message: E tu'ati te reira i te

cpyalllnknp.message: Te mau tapao atoa ei mau taairaa (✂️)

cpyalltxtnp.message: Te mau tapa'o atoa ei mau parau papa'i (✂️)

cpysellnknp.message: Te mau tapa'o i ma'itihia ei hono (✂️)

cpyseltxtnp.message: Ma'itihia ei mau tapa'o faahoro parau (✂️)

cpytablnknp.message: E tu'ati te reira i te (✂️)

tip1.message: The active tab is per default selected

tip2.message: Use CTRL to select additional tabs

tip3.message: Use SHIFT to select a range of tabs

tip4.message: All copy actions can be assigned shortcuts

tip5.message: All copy actions are also available via the tab context menu

tip6.message: LMB and MMB action of the toolbar button can be switched

tip7.message: Use MMB/LMB to invoke a copy action immediately

tip8.message: Select the immediate copy action via the toolbar buttons context menu

tip9.message: Give the developer some feedback so he'll know whats good and what needs impovement.
